channel.title: Driving – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Desert Rush
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Perform acrobatic driving skills from the desert dunes. Drive through the desert, set your drive settings as you desired. *WASD* = Drive/Reverse
item.content:encoded:
Perform acrobatic driving skills from the desert dunes. Drive through the desert, set your drive settings as you desired.
*WASD* = Drive/Reverse

item.title: Xtreme Racing Car Stunts Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Drive to the sky .*WASD* = driveing car

item.title: Scrap Metal 6
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Sixth version of the series Gran Turismo inspired.*WASD* or *arrows* = Drive*space* = Handbrake*shift* = Clutch*f* *v* = Gears*t* = Slow Motion*r* = Repair*enter* = Reset Car*0* to *8* = Visuals*mouse* = Move Camera
item.content:encoded:
Sixth version of the series Gran Turismo inspired.
*WASD* or *arrows* = Drive*space* = Handbrake*shift* = Clutch*f* *v* = Gears*t* = Slow Motion*r* = Repair*enter* = Reset Car*0* to *8* = Visuals*mouse* = Move Camera

item.title: Monster Truck Crush
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Monster Truck Crush is a skillful balanced monster truck racing arcade game. With 3D monster trucks, you need to defeat the AI opponent by arriving at the finish line in the first place. You can speed up immediately when your vehicle is balanced on the next platform.On PCW = gasS = backwardOn MobileTap the right […]
item.content:encoded:
Monster Truck Crush is a skillful balanced monster truck racing arcade game. With 3D monster trucks, you need to defeat the AI opponent by arriving at the finish line in the first place. You can speed up immediately when your vehicle is balanced on the next platform.
On PCW = gasS = backwardOn MobileTap the right button = gasTap the left button = backward

item.title: Fire Truck Driving Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes.On PCWASD or Arrow keys = driveTap the right button = change to the water gunSwipe the screen with the mouse = switch the cameraOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen
item.content:encoded:
Fire Truck Driving Simulator is a fire truck driving simulation game with 4 different modes.
On PCWASD or Arrow keys = driveTap the right button = change to the water gunSwipe the screen with the mouse = switch the cameraOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen

item.title: Bike Stunt Racing Legend
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Bike Stunt Racing Legend is a balanced stunt simulation game. You are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line. Don’t be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!On PCW = forwardS = backA = liftD = pressR = flipOn MobileTap […]
item.content:encoded:
Bike Stunt Racing Legend is a balanced stunt simulation game. You are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line. Don’t be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!
On PCW = forwardS = backA = liftD = pressR = flipOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen

item.title: Real Flight Simulator
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Real Flight Simulator is a casual airplane driving game. You can learn how to drive an airplane including starting, steering, and landing. All of the complicated instrument panels are simplified for you to learn.On PCSlide up and down the right button = powerWASD = steer the directionsOn MobileDarg the green button = steerSlide the right […]
item.content:encoded:
Real Flight Simulator is a casual airplane driving game. You can learn how to drive an airplane including starting, steering, and landing. All of the complicated instrument panels are simplified for you to learn.
On PCSlide up and down the right button = powerWASD = steer the directionsOn MobileDarg the green button = steerSlide the right button = power

item.title: Mega Ramp Car Stunts
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Mega Ramp Car Stunts is a hard-core stunt car-driving simulation game. With 3D obstacles on the track, you have a chance to challenge 10 levels in the Stunt Mode and 16 levels in the Giant Ramp mode. Whether you meet checkpoints or not, you need to drive the car to the finish line safely.On PCW […]
item.content:encoded:
Mega Ramp Car Stunts is a hard-core stunt car-driving simulation game. With 3D obstacles on the track, you have a chance to challenge 10 levels in the Stunt Mode and 16 levels in the Giant Ramp mode. Whether you meet checkpoints or not, you need to drive the car to the finish line safely.
On PCW = Speed upS = backwardA = turn leftD = turn rightShift = spray nitrogenOn MobileTap the buttons on the screenTap the Refresh button to reset your car

item.title: Desert Riders: Car Battle
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Desert Riders: Car Battle is a battle arcade game. Your car is equipped with a mechanic arm, a machine gun, and a baffle. You can crash enemy vehicles, punch them at the side, and shoot them when the machine gun skill is ready.On PC and MobileTap the buttons on the screen = attack and shootDrag […]
item.content:encoded:
Desert Riders: Car Battle is a battle arcade game. Your car is equipped with a mechanic arm, a machine gun, and a baffle. You can crash enemy vehicles, punch them at the side, and shoot them when the machine gun skill is ready.
On PC and MobileTap the buttons on the screen = attack and shootDrag and swipe = move the car

item.title: Moto Bike: Offroad Racing
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Moto Bike: Offroad Racing is a typical motorcycle-racing balanced game. On side-scrolling platform tracks, you need to arrive at the finish as fast as you can in both Racing Mode and Level Mode while keeping your rider alive.On PCW = pull the handlebarS = Push the handlebarA = brakeD = gasOn MobileTap buttons on the […]
item.content:encoded:
Moto Bike: Offroad Racing is a typical motorcycle-racing balanced game. On side-scrolling platform tracks, you need to arrive at the finish as fast as you can in both Racing Mode and Level Mode while keeping your rider alive.
On PCW = pull the handlebarS = Push the handlebarA = brakeD = gasOn MobileTap buttons on the screen
